Corrosive_Sap.help: You spray a target with toxic, corrosive Enzymes reducing the damage they deal as well as their damage resistance. Recharge: Slow
Corrosive_Sap.targetHelp: Your damage dealt and damage resistance have been reduced by the Corrosive Enzymes!
Corrosive_Sap.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has reduced {PlayerDest}'s resistances and damage output.
Corrosive_Sap.victimHit: Your damage dealt and resistance to damage has been reduced by the {PowerName} of {PlayerSource}.

Regrowth.help: By channeling the energies present in nature you are able to immediately heal yourself and allies in front of you for a small amount of health and cause them to recover a small amount of health over time. Regrowth places a stack of Bloom on its target. NOTE: When used in a PvP zone Regrowth will apply a moderate regeneration effect instead of a heal over time. Recharge: Moderate
Regrowth.shortHelp: Ranged Facing Cone, Minor Ally Heal, Ally Moderate Healing Over Time, +1 Bloom
Regrowth.targetHelp: The Regrowth effect is causing you to recover a small amount of hit points over time.

messages.attackerHit: You heal {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points.

messages.attackerHit: You heal {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points.

messages.attackerHit: You cause {PlayerDest} to regenerate health with your {PowerName}

Wild_Growth.help: You channel the power of nature into your allies allowing them to more easily shrug off damage and causing their wounds to heal more quickly. Wild Growth increases the damage resistance and boosts the regeneration rate of all affected allies. This power also grants 2 stacks of Bloom. Recharge: Very Long
Wild_Growth.targetHelp: Your damage resistance and regeneration rate has been increased by Wild Growth!
Wild_Growth.attackerHit: You imbue your allies with the power of nature increasing their damage resistance and regeneration rate.
Wild_Growth.victimHit: {PlayerSource} boosts your damage resistance and regeneration rate moderately with their {PowerName}!

Spore_Cloud.help: You create a large cloud of toxic spores around your targeted foe. The target and all nearby foes will have their damage output, chance to hit and regeneration rate reduced. Recharge: Long
Spore_Cloud.targetHelp: The Spore Cloud is reducing your damage, chance to hit and regeneration rate!
Spore_Cloud.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} weakens {PlayerDest} and all nearby foes.
Spore_Cloud.victimHit: You have been weakened by a {PowerName} from {PlayerSource}, decreasing your chance to hit, damage and regeneration.

Lifegiving_Spores.help: When activating this power you cause all allies at a selected location to recover a small amount of health and endurance every few seconds as long as they remain within the Lifegiving Spores. Recharge: Very Fast
Lifegiving_Spores.shortHelp: Toggle (Location AoE), PBAoE +Minor Heal Over Time, +Endurance
Lifegiving_Spores.targetHelp: While you stand within the Lifegiving Spores you will recover a small amount of health and endurance every few seconds.

Wild_Bastion.help: You encase yourself and nearby allies in a protective barrier that will absorb a moderate amount of damage. Additionally, affected allies will heal for a portion of their health over time. Wild Bastion places 3 stacks of Bloom on all affected targets. Recharge: Very Long
Wild_Bastion.attackerHit: You shield nearby allies in your {PowerName} granting them a measure of damage absorption and causing them to heal over time.
Wild_Bastion.victimHit: {PlayerSource} infuses you with nature's power granting you a measure of damage absorption and causing you to heal over time.

messages.attackerHit: You heal {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points.

Rebirth.help: Rebirth can either greatly heal a conscious ally for a large amount of health over time or it can revive a fallen ally with a large amount of health and endurance and cause them to recover health over time. This power also grants 3 stacks of Bloom. Recharge: Very Long
Rebirth.shortHelp: Ranged, Ally Rez, +Heal Over Time, Special, +3 Bloom
Rebirth.targetHelp: You have been revived and are recovering health over time.
Rebirth.confirm: {PlayerSource} would like to Resurrect you. You will have partial Health and Endurance and recover health over a short period of time. Do you Accept?

Raging_Tempest.help: While this power is active there is a high chance that entangling vines will grasp nearby foes and render them held for a short time. Recharge: Fast.
Raging_Tempest.targetHelp: Standing in the Entangling Aura can render you held.
Raging_Tempest.attackerHit: You surround yourself in a Entangling Aura. Enemies who get too close may be held.

Overgrowth.help: Becoming a conduit of nature itself, you greatly boost the damage, to hit and endurance discount of nearby allies for a long period of time. Overgrowth also grants the affected targets 5 stacks of Bloom. Recharge: Very Long
Overgrowth.targetHelp: Overgrowth has greatly increased your damage, chance to hit and also granted you an endurance cost discount.
Overgrowth.attackerHit: You greatly increase the damage output, chance to hit of nearby allies as well as granting them an endurance cost discount for a short time.
Overgrowth.victimHit: {PlayerSource} increases your damage, chance to hit and grants you an endurance discount.
